title: Power Meets Power as Yankees, Astros Collide in ALCS
text:
Years from now, if a documentary filmmaker wants to capture the current era of Major League Baseball, they might do well to open with the top of the first inning on Saturday in Houston.

Taking the field for Game 1 of the ALCS will be the Astros, whose pitchers this season struck out more batters than any team in baseball history except one: the 2018 Astros. At the plate will be the New York Yankees, who hit more home runs this season than any team in baseball history except one: the team they just swept in the ALDS, the Minnesota...
description: In one of the most anticipated LCS match-ups in years, Houston’s strikeout pitchers will oppose New York’s home run-mashing lineup.
